lead_paragraph: KOBI--Michi. Actress, activist, author. November 2, 1924 - March 1, 2016. Memorial Service Sunday, May 1, 2016, 2:00pm at The Japanese American Association of NY, 49 W. 45th Street, 11th Floor. 1/3
